snippet.title: Office Jerk Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Got a case of the Mondays? Unleash your rage and embrace your inner Office Jerk in the feel-good app of the year from Fluik Entertainment and Big Fat Simulations. Available for free on the iTunes App Store
http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/office-jerk/id423593206?mt=8&ls=1

Amazon Market
http://www.amazon.com/Fluik-Entertainment-Inc-Office-Jerk/dp/B0057J06HQ/ref=sr_1_1?s=mobile-apps&ie=UTF8&qid=1347897599&sr=1-1

Google Play
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fluik.OfficeJerkFree&hl=en
